ingredients.ingredient: 10 (.18 ounce) packets sazon seasoning with coriander and achiote, such as Goya®
½ (12 fluid ounce) bottle Mexican beer (such as Corona®)

cookingTips: Pound the steak with a meat mallet to tenderize and create even thickness
White pepper is milder and more subtle than black pepper; use it generously for delicate flavor
Beer tenderizes the meat and adds subtle malty notes; don't skip it
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I pound the steak evenly without tearing it, and how should I cook it to get a nice crust?
